caption.p: Inhibition of anti-apoptotic Bcl-2 family proteins abrogates the protection mediated by ZIKV. A549 cells were infected with ZIKV at MOI of 1. TNFα and CHX were added 2 h post infection for 6 h with or without ABT-737. A549 cells were immunostained with an anti-BAX antibody (representative images in panels on the right, white scale bar: 10µm) ( A) and caspase 3/7 activity was followed after treatment ( B). A549 cells were infected with ZIKV at MOI of 1 and level of Bcl-2 was followed by western blot 24 h post infection ( C). Values represent the mean and standard deviation of three independent experiments. Data were analyzed by a one-way ANOVA test with post-hoc Tukey’s test (* p < 0.05; ** p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001, **** p < 0.0001, ns = not significant).
